title: TechnoBiz Expo 2024
description: Website: https://expo.technobiz.org Description: TechnoBiz Expo 2024 in Bangkok, Thailand is focusing on innovative industrial, utility and safety technologies and products. The expo sub-components include: Recycling & Recovery Expo, Membrane & Filtration Expo, Personal Protection Equipment Expo, Industry Innovations Pavilion and Water & Wastewater Expo. It has trade exhibition and conference programs.
